resources:
Send WhatsApp message to unsaved contacts directly. WhatsCheck
WhatsCheck allows the users to analyze WhatsApp messages offensiveness before sending them. It also warns the user with a popup if the message to be sent was detected as offensive. This application was developed using the interface of Direct to Chat, an open source application developed by Mohammad Yasir which has the logic to send the messages over WhatsApp.\nFor the analysis of the messages, an average word vector TensorFlow Lite model has been trained using an english offensiveness dataset and some examples provided by Nitin Tiwari.\nThis application is not affiliated or associated with WhatsApp in any way. Source code in GitHub. Sent icon by Icons8 Flags of countries obtained from Flagpedia.net Fluent UI System Icons by Microsoft Attributionsp About
